Name: Mask Social Security Number
Description: Social Security Number should be replaced with dummy values

Name: Redact Patient Birthdate
Description: Patient Birthdate should be kept hidden.

Name: Mask Sensitive personal information
Description: Mask Sensitive personal information such as Race, Ethnicity and Gender.

Name: Restrict access for Passport and Driver's License number
Description: Restrict visibility of assets containing Passport and Driver's License to certain users.
